meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Julia Lawrence Lawrence Dernulc Jennifer Morrow Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7115.

td.p: Julia Lawrence, an English teacher originally from Rye, New York
Lawrence Dernulc, a business manager originally from Salisbury, Maryland
Jennifer Morrow, an editorial assistant from New York, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $19,200)

tr.td: THE SPORTING LIFE
HISTORICAL NICKNAMES
ACIDS
(Alex: Each correct response begins with the letter "C" and has a total of four letters in it.)
WHAT'S YOUR SIGN?
FOR SALE

An account of her historic trial noted, "It was conceded that the defendant was, on the 5th November 1872, a woman"
Jennifer
Lawrence
Julia

2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
Jennifer
Lawrence
Julia

(including 2 DDs),
2 W

(including 1 DD)

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
